title: An unexpected error occurred while logging in.
body:
Hey guys i need help , today i want login to league of legends client and if i click to "Sing in" it throws out login error : An unexpected error occurred while logging in. I tried reinstall league of legends , update , update windows , change password and nothing worked. 
Anyone experiencing the same thing or know how to fix it ?

replies.body: This could be a network issue specifically failing to reach the authentication server.  To help rule out some possibilities and start off with basic troubleshooting, I recommend going through each step of the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide.  Let me know if it helps!
This is happening to a lot of ppl please fix i havent played in 2 weeks
I've got the same problem, noticed today around 12:00. Already sent a ticket and I'm waitin for response.
